    • Method Detail

      • equals

        public static boolean equals(Object object1,
             Object object2)
        Compares two objects for equality. If the objects are arrays, then an array comparison is performed.
        Parameters:
        object1 - an object
        object2 - another object
        Returns:
        true, if the objects are equal, false otherwise

      • serialize

        public static byte[] serialize(Object object)
        Serializes the specified object.
        Parameters:
        object - the serialization target
        Returns:
        a serialized object

      • deserialize

        public static <T> T deserialize(byte[] bytes)
        Deserializes the specified bytes into the object of the specified type using HA-JDBC's classloader.
        Parameters:
        bytes - a serialized object
        Returns:
        a deserialized object

      • deserialize

        public static <T> T deserialize(byte[] bytes,
                ClassLoader loader)
        Deserializes the specified bytes into the object of the specified type.
        Parameters:
        bytes - a serialized object
        loader - the classloader used during deserialization
        Returns:
        a deserialized object

      • readObject

        public static <T> T readObject(ObjectInput input)
        Reads an object from the input stream using HA-JDBC's classloader.
        Parameters:
        input - an input stream
        Returns:
        a deserialized object

      • readObject

        public static <T> T readObject(ObjectInput input,
               ClassLoader loader)
        Reads an object from the input stream using the specified classloader.
        Parameters:
        input - an input stream
        loader - a classloader
        Returns:
        a deserialized object
